name: ATOMEGA
description: Grow, fight, collect and evade in the last cosmic arena the very end of time. Acquire MASS to evolve your EXOFORM from the nimble ATOM to the godlike OMEGA and compete for fun and dominance in a fast-paced, multiplayer shooter. ATOMEGA™ !
minimum_requirements: 最低: 64 ビットプロセッサとオペレーティングシステムが必要です OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only) プロセッサー: Intel Core i3-550 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD  FX 4100 @ 3.6 GHz or equivalent メモリー: 4 GB RAM グラフィック: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 (2GB VRAM)  or AMD HD7750 (2GB VRAM) or more
recommended_requirements: 推奨: 64 ビットプロセッサとオペレーティングシステムが必要です OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only) プロセッサー: Intel Core i5- 2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz メモリー: 6 GB RAM グラフィック: NVIDIA GeForce GTX760 (4GB  VRAM) or AMD R9 280X (3GB VRAM) or more
